main event: On 3 August 1953, at approximately 12:35 hours, unidentified flying objects were observed over the Amarillo Air Force Base by personnel at the control tower.
interesting points: The objects were described as maneuvering in the sky, one was initially thought to be a large balloon but was confirmed not to be, The sighting lasted for approximately 45 minutes, The objects were shining brightly and displayed high-speed maneuvers, The features observed are common in many unidentified flying object reports.
witness description: military personnel with over 2,000 hours of flying time
